title: Finally
lyrics:
[intro] (D) (Em) (Bm) (Bm)  x2
 
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (Bm)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face and I (Bm)just cannot hide it
(D)Meeting Mr. (Em)Right… the (Bm)man of my dreams
The (D)one who shows me (Em)true love… (Bm) or at least it seems
With (D)brown cocoa (Em)skin and (Bm)curly black hair
It's (D)just the way he (Em)looks at me that (Bm)gentle loving stare
 
[chorus]
(D) Final(Em)ly… (Bm)you've come along
The (D)way I feel a(Em)bout you it just (Bm)can't be wrong
(D)If you only (Em)knew… the (Bm)way I feel about you
(D) I (Em)just can't des(Bm)cribe it, oh no no
 
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face… my fee(G)lings… can't describe it
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face and I (G)just cannot hide it
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face… my fee(G)lings… can't describe it
(D)Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face and I (G)just cannot hide it
 
It (D)seems so many (Em)times… he (G)seemed to be the one
But (D)all he ever (Em)wanted was to (G)have a little fun
But (D)now you've come a(Em)long… and (G)brightened up my world
(D)In my heart I (Em)feel it, I'm that (G)special kinda girl
 
[chorus]
(D) Final(Em)ly… (Bm)you've come along
The (D)way I feel a(Em)bout you it just (Bm)can't be wrong
(D)If you only (Em)knew… the (Bm)way I feel about you
(D) I (Em)just can't des(Bm)cribe it, oh no no
 
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face… my fee(G)lings… can't describe it
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face and I (G)just cannot hide it
(D) Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face… my fee(G)lings… can't describe it
(D)Final(Em)ly it has (G)happened to me
Right in (D)front of my (Em)face and I (G)just cannot hide it
 
(D)Finally (Em) (Bm)
(D)Finally (Em) (Bm)
 
(D) (Em) (Bm) (Bm)  x2
